ygData.subject: Re: New to List
ygData.msgSnippet: That s okay ... it would be nice to get two mails in one day, even if it is the same one! The list is unfortunately rather quiet as of late. :( lets see if I
ygData.messageBody:
That's okay ... it would be nice to get two mails in one day, even if it is
the same one! The list is unfortunately rather quiet as of late. :(

lets see if I can help at all.

The merchant in South Ro in the northwest corner sells to evil characters,
but he is quite expensive unfortunately.
The dark elves in the middle of the S Ro desert now sell combines, so you
can buy one.I think they might sell food and water too.
If you haven't been out of Innothule Swamp yet, how do you know you are
dubious in Neriak? I have known many many cazic thule worshipping trolls and
they don't have any problems getting around in Neriak. I'd suggest trying
that again.

You can buy from the centaurs in S Karana (long time before you get there
though)

It used to be that if you bought Buer or something like that, in the
freeport underground, beer, he'd give you faction with the militia. For now
that is taken out, but if it is fixed, it is a relatively easy, if somewhat
expensive, way to get freeport faction. I helped one or two trolls be abe to
walk into Freeport. It's a sight to see.

All that comes to mind right now, but I'm sure that there is more.

Welcome to the (quiet) list.
